lead_paragraph: Kopitar scored late in the third period and early in overtime to cap Los Angeles’s comeback from a two-goal deficit.

headline.print_headline: Anze Kopitar Ties Game, Then Wins It as Kings Rally Past Rangers
headline.main: Anze Kopitar Ties Game, Then Wins It as Kings Rally Past Rangers
